text.text: How can a lifetime signature be indicated for a patient in ZOLL Billing?

text: In ZOLL Billing, you can indicate that there is a lifetime signature on file for a patient that covers this and all future claims. This setting can be applied at claim creation or anytime during the life of the claim.

text.text: Can lifetime signatures be set during claim creation, or can they be applied later during the life of the claim

text: Yes, lifetime signatures can be set during claim creation or anytime during the life of the claim.

text.text: Where are signatures applied during the claim creation process in ZOLL Billing?

text: Signatures are applied at the bottom of the Transport details tab during claim creation.

text.text: What are the steps involved in setting a lifetime signature during claim creation in ZOLL Billing?

text: To set a lifetime signature during claim creation, you can click All claims (lifetime signature) on the Signatures tab on the Claim page. For all signatures except lifetime, you can click the edit pencil to modify the signature.

text.text: Once a lifetime signature is set, where can it be viewed and managed within ZOLL Billing?

text: Once a lifetime signature is set, it can be viewed and managed on the Claim page > Signature tab of all the active claims and the Audit tab on the Account page.

text.text: Where do signatures display on the Claim page in ZOLL Billing, and how can they be modified?

text: Signatures display on the Signatures tab on the Claim page. For all signatures except lifetime, you can click the edit pencil to modify the signature.

text.text: Can lifetime signatures be modified or removed directly from the Claim page in ZOLL Billing?

text: Lifetime signatures can be modified or removed directly from the Claim page. When you remove a lifetime signature, claims revert to claim-level signatures. The removal of the lifetime signature will be reflected on the Claim page > Signature tab of all the active claims and the Audit tab on the Account page.

text.text: If a lifetime signature needs to be modified or removed, what is the alternative process in ZOLL Billing?

text: The claim will revert to a signature for this claim only.

text.text: How can users access the patient's Account page to manage lifetime signatures in ZOLL Billing?

text: To view all the PCSs on file for a patient, go to the patient's Account page > Coordination of Benefits tab.

text.text: Is there a specific tab or section on the patient's Account page dedicated to managing lifetime signatures in ZOLL Billing?

text: There is no specific tab or section on the patient's Account page dedicated to managing lifetime signatures in ZOLL Billing.

text.text: When a lifetime signature is removed from a patient's account, how is this change reflected in ZOLL Billing?

text: The removal of the lifetime signature will be reflected on the Claim page > Signature tab of all the active claims and the Audit tab on the Account page.

text.text: Are there any audit trails or logs in ZOLL Billing that track changes made to lifetime signatures?

text: The company audit trail lists actions performed by ZOLL Billing users. This includes the user's name, the date, a brief description of the action taken, and the area that was impacted by the action.

text.text: What implications does setting a lifetime signature have on future claims for the patient in ZOLL Billing?

text: A lifetime signature can be applied at claim creation or anytime during the life of the claim. This setting covers this claim and all future claims.

text.text: Can multiple lifetime signatures be set for the same patient in ZOLL Billing?

text: Yes, you can assign multiple roles to a user.

text.text: How to set a lifetime signature during claim creation?

text: To set a lifetime signature during claim creation, you can click Patient and then the selection that applies under Signature authorizes. You can then click All claims (lifetime signature).
